page.title: 11ST. JOHNS
page.content: St. Johns psychiatric hospital is situated in Stone.It serves a large area of Buckinghamshire. The main building which houses all the wards was mainly constructed during the Victorian era, although there has been many additions during recent years. There are wooden prefabricated huts around the original brick buildings. Hospital staff accomodation has progressed over the last eighty years from a row of houses along the Oxford Road,opposite the hospital, to a small housing estate including two blocks of flats. Within the hospital grounds other buildings include a sports and social club, a church and a fire station with its own tender specifically to serve St. Johns.
